doc.previous: Without such a formal cooperation the Swedish Conversations lexicon 4 volumes 1821 1826 was a translation of Brockhaus 2nd edition The first encyclopedia written originally in Swedish was Svenskt konversationslexikon 4 volumes 1845 1851 by Per Gustaf Berg A more ambitious project was Nordisk familjebok established in 1875 and intended to comprise 6 volumes But in 1885 when it had published 8 volumes and gotten only halfways A K the publisher turned to the government for extra funding encyclopedias had become national monuments It was finished in 1894 with 18 volumes 13 with two supplement volumes 1896 1899
doc.after: The first major Danish encyclopedia was Salmonsens Konversationsleksikon 19 volumes 1893 1911
